name: Run It Back
description:
By: therealarman

Run It Back is a music themed puzzle game where you use cassette tapes to guide your character to victory! Play cassette tapes forward or reversed to move your character in different patterns in order to reach the goal.

This game is a submission for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020 #2 created in 6 days. The theme was "Reverse".

Controls & How To Play:

This game is meant to be played with a Mouse & Keyboard

  • Drag and drop a Cassette Tape into the boombox to load it.
  • Once it is loaded in, hit Q to play the tape forward.
  • After a disk has been played forwards, it must be reversed using E which will move the character in the opposite pattern shown on the tape.
  • Move your character to collect the music note on each level and win!
  • Hit M to mute the music.
Credits:

Made with Unity 2019.3.15

All code, music, and SFX were created by me.

All graphics (excluding fonts) were created by my Father.

"Gamer" Font: https://www.dafont.com/gamer-2.font
"Game Over" Font: https://www.dafont.com/game-over.font
